law.text: If a petition or comparable pleading is received by an inappropriate tribunal of this state, the tribunal shall forward the pleading and accompanying documents to an appropriate tribunal of this state or another state and notify the petitioner where and when the pleading was sent.
law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 18, sec. 19, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 6, effective March 23, 1998.-- Contingent effective date repealed 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 101, sec. 20, effective March 23, 1998. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 365, sec. 30, effective upon contingency.
